item.title: An 'academic' discussion on Twitter

item.title: Day 67-81
item.description: The motivation to face the fear is similarly straightforward: my R code runs too slowly for some of the problems I care about. It doesn‚Äôt come up that often, to be honest. Most problems I work on are small enough that it really doesn‚Äôt matter that my R code is slow. Other problems are standard enough that I can rely on other people‚Äôs compiled code to do all the work…
